intro: Buccaferrea hornemannii, commonly known as the hornemannii buccaferrera, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its woody structure and large, palmately lobed leaves. It produces showy, clustered flowers that are typically pink or red in color. This species is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
